title: 86/166/EEC: Commission Decision of 9 April 1986 approving a modification to the programme for the pigmeat sector in Denmark pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the Danish text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 9 April 1986
approving a modification to the programme for the pigmeat sector in Denmark pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the Danish text is authentic)
(86/166/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The modification to the programme for the pigmeat sector in Denmark forwarded by the Danish Government on 20 February 1985 is hereby approved insofar as it concerns the expansion and specialization in the meat processing sector and the adaptation of pig slaughtering capacity is concerned subject to the reservations set out in the recitals above.
This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Denmark.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 April 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 130, 16. 5. 1985, p. 1.
